attributes.action: Put an end to the Barnett Formula funding to Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This way of providing funding is extremely unfair.  While ever we remain a United Kingdom, all citizens should recieve the same amount of funding per person regardless of which nation they live in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
